characterDescription:
Natata Ved was scholar of old on Roshar.
Though she lived two hundred years after the death of then King NanKhet and the founding of the Siln dynasty, her account of NanKhet's life and death are considered to be her best work.
Despite those two hundred years, she insisted that her research was meticulous, despite that modern scholarship was still very young during Natata Ved's lifetime.

characterDetails.Character: She had a passion for the dramatic.
